text: Apani yakhana tadera kache (tadera ca'oya mata) kono ayata [1] niye asena na, takhana tara bale, ‘apani nije'i ekati ayata baniye nena na kena?’ Baluna, ‘amara rabera paksa theke ya amara kache ohi hisebe prerana kara haya, ami to sudhu tara'i anusarana kari. E kura'ana tomadera rabera paksa theke spasta pramana. Ara hidayata o rahamata emana sampradayera jan'ya yara imana ane
